titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for an adjournment of the House from August 11, 1988 to September 7, 1988 and a recess or adjournment of the Senate from August 11 or 12, 1988 to September 7, 1988.

action.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives on August 11, 1988, until September 7, 1988, and of the Senate from August 11 or 12, 1988, until September 7, 1988.
